new_entities.name: REU

new_events.title: RST/SLG Financial Year Commencement
new_events.description: Beginning of financial year for RegimA Skin Treatments (RST) and Strategic Logistics (SLG). This marks the start of the period covered by trial balance evidence showing systematic financial manipulation.

new_events.title: Villa Via Financial Year Commencement
new_events.description: Beginning of financial year for Villa Via. Different year-end from RST/SLG creates complexity in group reporting and opportunities for manipulation.

new_events.title: Coordinated Inter-Company Cost Reallocations
new_events.description: Multiple adjusting journal entries across entities on same date: RWW R500K stock provision write-back, RWW R810K admin fee reallocation to production costs, SLG R252K admin fee reallocation to production costs, SLG R80K production cost transfer to RST. Coordinated timing suggests deliberate manipulation.

new_events.title: Year-End Inter-Company Interest and Loan Transactions
new_events.description: Critical year-end adjustments: SLG pays R414,334.09 interest to RST per loan agreement (3.19% rate on R13M debt), RST advances R750K loan to RWW for production costs, Directors' fee adjustment of R784K in RST. These transactions demonstrate profit shifting from SLG to RST.

new_events.title: Villa Via Year-End - Capital Extraction Evidence
new_events.description: Villa Via financial year-end showing R3.7M profit from R4.4M rental income, while maintaining R22.8M members loan account. Members loan is 5.2x annual rental income, indicating systematic capital extraction over multiple years.

new_events.title: Danie Bantjes Email - Financial Statement Finalization
new_events.description: Email from Danie Bantjes to Bernadine Wright, Jacqui Faucitt (Jax), Peter Andrew Faucitt, Rynette Farrar, and Daniel Faucitt with final trial balances. 6-month delay from year-end suggests complex manipulation requiring extended finalization. Meeting scheduled with Bernadine Wright for sign-off.
new_events.significance: CRITICAL - Links Rynette to 2020 financial access, establishes Bernadine Wright as key decision-maker
red_flags: Rynette present in financial discussions (later led 2025 cover-up)

new_relations.description: Bernadine Wright as financial decision-maker for RST
SLG owes RST R12,971,390.13 (87% of SLG annual sales)
new_relations.significance: Creates financial dependency and control mechanism

new_relations.description: RST dumps production costs on RWW via R750K loan mechanism
SLG pays 3.19% interest to RST (R414K annually on R13M debt)
new_relations.significance: Profit shifting via artificially low interest rate

new_relations.description: Rynette Farrar had financial access in 2020 (email recipient) and led 2025 cover-up
new_relations.significance: CRITICAL - Establishes continuity of access from 2020 to 2025 fraud

new_relations.description: Rynette appointed Danie Bantjes as Trustee in July 2024 (T-10 months before Ketoni payout)
new_relations.significance: CRITICAL - Links 2020 accountant to 2024 trust control consolidation

year_end_manipulation.description: Critical adjustments made in final days of financial year
year_end_manipulation.evidence: Feb 20-28, 2020: 8-day window for major inter-company adjustments
year_end_manipulation.significance: Suggests deliberate timing to avoid scrutiny

suspicious_interest_rate.analysis: Rate appears artificially low for inter-company loan
suspicious_interest_rate.implication: Possible benefit transfer to RST at SLG expense

coordinated_cost_reallocations.description: Multiple entities reallocate admin fees to production costs simultaneously
coordinated_cost_reallocations.evidence: RWW: R810K, SLG: R252K on same date (2020-02-20)
coordinated_cost_reallocations.implication: Coordinated effort to obscure true cost structures

excessive_capital_extraction.description: Villa Via members loan is 5.2x annual rental income
excessive_capital_extraction.analysis: Suggests systematic capital extraction over multiple years
excessive_capital_extraction.implication: Villa Via used as vehicle for wealth extraction

centralized_bookkeeping.vulnerability: Single point of control enables manipulation

staggered_year_ends.manipulation_potential: Allows timing of transactions between periods

inter_company_debt_leverage.description: SLG owes RST R13M (87% of SLG annual sales)

jax_vindication.insight: Evidence shows Jax as fraud detector, not perpetrator
jax_vindication.implication: Supports defense narrative of Jax as victim
jax_vindication.strategic_value: Undermines prosecution claims of Jax involvement
jax_vindication.action_required: Emphasize Jax's role in confronting fraud (May 15, 2025)

pre_fraud_baseline.insight: Trial balance evidence provides pre-fraud baseline
pre_fraud_baseline.strategic_value: Shows pattern of behavior, not isolated incident
pre_fraud_baseline.action_required: Integrate 2020 evidence into current case narrative

rynette_continuity.insight: Rynette had financial access in 2020 and led 2025 cover-up
rynette_continuity.implication: Establishes long-term involvement in financial manipulation
rynette_continuity.strategic_value: Proves pattern of access and control over 5 years
rynette_continuity.action_required: Map Rynette's access evolution from 2020 to 2025

bantjes_connection.implication: Links financial manipulation expertise to trust control
